name: JustinTV / Twitch oEmbed
author: Mitch Canter

sections.description: Simply paste in a JustinTV / Twitch URL into the WordPress page/post editor.  The plugin will automatically embed the URL into the published content.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Use the following URL strucures when pasting in JustinTV or Twitch links:

http://twitch.tv/
http://twitch.tv//b/*
http://justin.tv//w/*
http://justin.tv//b/*

short_description: Allows you to seamlessly embed JustinTV / Twitch videos with only a link.  Uses the embed.ly API.
description: Simply paste in a JustinTV / Twitch URL into the WordPress page/post editor.  The plugin will automatically embed the URL into the published content.
